text: The Greeks Had a Word for Them is a 1932 American comedy movie directed by Lowell Sherman and is based on the play The Greeks Had a Word for It by Zoe Akins. It stars Joan Blondell, Madge Evans, Ina Claire, David Manners, Lowell Sherman, Phillips Smalley, Sidney Bracey, Louise Beavers, Wilson Benge, Ward Bond and was distributed by United Artists. == Other websites == * Category:1932 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Lowell Sherman
title: The Greeks Had a Word for Them
